comments.author: Dave
comments.body: 4Mile is a bit of a stretch for my newly-engineered kick bike. I'll do some hill work afoot today. I talked to a welder, though, and it sounds like there's hope for the Wheeler. Taking it in for a checkup later this week. You'd think a $20 bike would have a longer life span, wouldn't you? Sheesh.

comments.author: Greg
comments.body: There's always hope for the Wheeler. Sorry to hear you'll be on foot, DU. Count me in for 4Mile--I need to blow this Popsicle stand for a bit! GES

comments.author: Dave
comments.body: Against the orders of at least three doctors and one wife, I checked out a Buff Bike, rode up to the Gregory Canyon trailhead, and ran the Ampitheater loop. Carumba! What a great trail... all of the ground cover is greening up, the wild plum is blooming, and Gregory Creek is groovin' away. Gotta' love spring!

comments.author: iSean
comments.body: I woke up Saturday morning (around 6:30), noticed the snow on the ground, shut my window, and went back to bed. THIS is why I don't make promises: I'm a wuss.
